issue.title: Friction model feature / friction pyramid parameters

content.raw:
dart has a friction direction parameter, and I'm pretty sure it's in the global frame

* https://github.com/dartsim/dart/blob/master/dart/constraint/ContactConstraint.cpp#L689-L700

if we had a contact callback, we could try updating it to track a body-fixed frame

here's some bullet code about friction directions:

* https://github.com/erwincoumans/bullet3/blob/36a9dcf/src/BulletDynamics/ConstraintSolver/btSequentialImpulseConstraintSolver.cpp#L1434
